<template>
  <button 
    :style="{background: color}" 
    class="btn"
    @click="onClick()">
    {{ text }}
  </button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'Button',
  props: {
    text: String,
    color: String
  },
  methods: {
    onClick() {

    }
  }
}
</script>
